page.title: 13PROPERTY FOR SALE
page.content: There are 8 houses for sale in this area.Two are for renovation and modernising.One is a half timbered, four roomed cottage.The other is an {old water mill}at Hadley.These are to be sold at auction.Â£65,000 is expected for the mill.Three other cottages are for sale.One being sold privately had three bedrooms and a small garden but is on the A449.It has been for sale for two years !The other cottages are both 2 bedroomed,semi-detached and about 150 years old.Both have been modernised and are about Â£40,000.These have been for sale for 1 month. Southall Farm is sold.It has 7 bedrooms ,swimming pool,music room and 4 reception rooms.It was Â£110,000 and took 8 months to sell.There are 3 modern houses,one in Ombersley and 2 in Sytchampton.All have 4 bedrooms and are{luxury homes},for about Â£80,000.
